actions.message:
1. Don't ping people
2. If you swear, your message will be hidden with spoiler tag (you will also get rebuke)
3. To attach image to your message type in it's text 'img' (please use another shorts to say image if you aren't attaching anything)
4. Messages can be deleted by administrator if they are considered unapropriate or stupid (for example: gugaau)
5. Everything written here appears on spotted channel as anonymous message (it's deleted from this channel)
6. Administrator can set slow mode
7. Mute this channel
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
1. Only administartor can see this channel
2. On this channel you can see what was sent by who (there must be way to punish trolls)
3. To activate nsfw addon type \nsfw on any channel
   - 2 new channels will be created:
      -nsfw - same as post
      -nsfw-spotted - same as spotted spotted
   - they work exactly the same
   - role 'nsfw spotter' will be created, allowing peolpe to see nsfw addon channels
   - you will get logs from this channel to
4. I recommend setting slow mode on channel post/nsfw (in order to protect it from getting spammed)
5. Unluckily you must manually forbid role 'nsfw spotter' from sending messages to nsfw-spotted
6. I recomend grupping channel (i assume not every one will use them)
7. Please restrain yourself from changing bot permissions in order to keep it working
8. You can use command \cl x y, x - number of messages to delete from post channel, y - same for nsfw channel
9. I strongly recommend manual data save
10. Command \rc recreates channles post, logs, and spotted (in case of another admin betrayal)


Check if:
1. Kchannel logs is private
2. People are forbidden from sending messages on spotted channel

If you activate nsfw addon check if:
1. Channels nsfw and nsfw-spotted are visible only for role nsfw spotter
2. Sending messages on nsfw-spotted is forbidden

Just to be sure do the same after using \rc or \nsfw command

Attention!
To ensure total privacy bot will be sending (and instantly deleting) messages on post and nsfw channel to force people to mute them
